title: So i got banned...
body:

i got banned cause i was toxic, i get it. 
But im really curious, why i didnt get chat restriction first?
And what do you think about my chat log? i have read about skipping penalties if you are extremely toxic but is this like extremely toxic?
I am pretty sure i was not toxic in previous games and i face 10 times more toxic people every day....

And i am pretty sure i got a lot of reports just because 4 players on my team didnt like that i picked lee sin in one for all. They were whining all game long how this is not fun. But i just wanted to have a relaxing game....

And i was a little frustrated already so i responded to them a little too aggresively...

replies.body: Was this the entire chat log? I'm kinda cautious because normally there is a little "Game 1" at the start even when only one game is presented to the player.
I deleted this little game 1. My bad. Everything else is unchanged tho...
In that case I agree with Krol. You should submit a support ticket because I don't see anything worthy of it being an escalated punishment.
Was this the first action against your account, or have you had chat restrictions before?
It was the first action (not counting leaver-buster)

Hm. This is interesting.

It certainly would be actionable, but I don't see anything that would cause a punishment escalation. Those are generally reserved for hate speech or calls to self harm.

I'd submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), just to see if the incorrect logs got shown, or if the punishment was improperly escalated.
Sexual harrassment and threats are also grounds for escalated behavior punishment. Just thought I would throw that in there.
Send a ticket in that case this shouldn't even classify as a normal tier punishment to begin with. Either it's a mistake or the system gave you the wrong chat/didn't include the pre/post game chat.

you get a cookie for not complaining on PB for being banned for obvious reasons and actually used it for inquires.
https://imgur.com/gallery/fgQod
So u think i deserved to skip other penalties?
Did you say anything in the post game lobby?
The IFS checks pregame and post game chat, so if you used any zero tolerance phrases there, that would cause an escalation. Otherwise, a support ticket asking about the escalation is a good idea.
